title: Fix hitboxes

embed.description: Take screenshots, GIFs, and replay videos that are ready to share. Get the free app for Windows, Mac, and mobile to effortlessly save and share what you see. Now in HD.

body: Yet another example of how inconsistent and misleading hitboxes and animations can be, as well as indicators. How long is it going to be until there is just a massive overhaul, or at least an ATTEMPT at fixing some of them? This isn't even a high ground / low ground example, this is just plain bullshit. (The indicator here, I can't fit 2 links: https://gyazo.com/cfaff1a34f679411e54ca149de9ad862 )

replies.body: Boy when they fix Ahri Charm hitbox, come get me. I've already made a whole thread about it.
